text: The Victoria ’ s Secret models spend months preparing for the Victoria ’ s Secret Fashion Show, which is set to air Dec. 2. They hit the gym for extra sessions and pay extra attention to their diets to ensure their legs are perfectly toned, and their stomachs are totally flat. But, while that might be the goal gig of the year, they certainly manage to look near perfect for the other 364 days too. The most surprising place they look flawless though is the airport. While the rest of us walk off the plane with greasy hair, dried out skin and sweatpants, the Angels manage to look like they ’ ve just stepped off the runway.
